body_html:
PCI-E is slow, and the communication cost is huge.
Yes you can run part of the network on CPU, by changing the device_type and engine arguments in some layers, and add a Copy layer to migrate data.
However it may be even slower than a pure CPU solution.
body_text:
PCI-E is slow, and the communication cost is huge.
Yes you can run part of the network on CPU, by changing the device_type and engine arguments in some layers, and add a Copy layer to migrate data.
However it may be even slower than a pure CPU solution.
body:
PCI-E is slow, and the communication cost is huge.
Yes you can run part of the network on CPU, by changing the `device_type` and `engine` arguments in some layers, and add a `Copy` layer to migrate data.
However it may be even slower than a pure CPU solution.
